data.title: David Rovics Archives

During my live shows, I often do a song I wrote about the San Patricios, a band of mostly Irishmen who deserted from the U.S. Army during the Mexican-American war and fought on the Mexican side.

i can’t help it. i don’t care how far you think the analogy extends itself. when i see you making that bus driver climb up and down on and off the roof of his bus for your amusement
